Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at Polk
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are standing near Polk due to debris on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are standing near Polk due to debris on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
